VALIDATION_MESSAGE.INVALID_QUANTITY_FORMAT: Quantity should be in number or hour format.
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.INVALID_TOTAL_FORMAT: Total should be in number format.
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.INVALID_TOTAL_SUM: Total should be equal to sum of Tax Amount, Subtotal and Freight Total.

VALIDATION_MESSAGE.TOO_SHORT: This value is too short. It should be at least {{min}} characters.
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.MAX_VALUE: This value is too big. It should be less than {{max}}.
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.MIN_VALUE: This value is too small. It should be at least {{min}}.
